item.description:
I assisted Christen Varley in organizing and promoting the April 15th Tax Day Tea Party and was the lead organizer of the Boston Independence Day Tea Party.

I have decided that I can have a greater impact on promoting lower taxes, limited government and constitutional principles as an elected representative. That is why I have decided to run for State Representative from the Massachusetts Suffolk Eighth District (Back Bay, Beacon Hill, Cambridge and The West End.)

While I may not represent your district I do believe I represent your interests. I am inviting you to my official Campaign Kickoff at the Hampshire House (Above Cheers) in Boston.

You can learn more about my campaign at BradMarston.com

We intend to run a strong "e-campaign" and invite you to join that as well.

Hope to see you on the ninth.

Regards,

Brad Marston
item.name: Campaign Kick Off
